segment.source: Activate an Active Directory Forest Online (Windows 10)
segment.target: Activate an Active Directory Forest Online (Windows 10)

segment.source: Activate an Active Directory Forest Online
segment.target: Activate an Active Directory Forest Online

segment.source: Activate an Active Directory Forest Online
segment.target: Activate an Active Directory Forest Online

segment.source: You can use the Volume Activation Management Tool (VAMT) Active Directory-Based Activation (ADBA) function to activate an Active Directory (AD) forest over the Internet.
segment.target: You can use the Volume Activation Management Tool (VAMT) Active Directory-Based Activation (ADBA) function to activate an Active Directory (AD) forest over the Internet.

segment.source: ADBA enables certain products to inherit activation from the domain.
segment.target: ADBA enables certain products to inherit activation from the domain.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: ADBA is only applicable to Generic Volume License Keys (GVLKs) and KMS Host keys (CSVLKs).
segment.target: ADBA is only applicable to Generic Volume License Keys (GVLKs) and KMS Host keys (CSVLKs).

segment.source: To use ADBA, one or more KMS Host keys (CSVLKs) must be installed on the AD forest, and client keys (GVLKs) must be installed on the client products.
segment.target: To use ADBA, one or more KMS Host keys (CSVLKs) must be installed on the AD forest, and client keys (GVLKs) must be installed on the client products.

segment.source: Requirements
segment.target: Requirements

segment.source: Before performing online activation, ensure that the network and the VAMT installation meet the following requirements:
segment.target: Before performing online activation, ensure that the network and the VAMT installation meet the following requirements:

segment.source: VAMT is installed on a host computer that has Internet access.
segment.target: VAMT is installed on a host computer that has Internet access.

segment.source: VAMT has administrative permissions to the Active Directory domain.
segment.target: VAMT has administrative permissions to the Active Directory domain.

segment.source: The KMS Host key (CSVLK) you intend to use is added to VAMT in the Product Keys node.
segment.target: The KMS Host key (CSVLK) you intend to use is added to VAMT in the Product Keys node.

segment.source: To perform an online Active Directory forest activation
segment.target: To perform an online Active Directory forest activation

segment.source: Open VAMT.
segment.target: Open VAMT.

segment.source: In the left-side pane, click the Active Directory-Based Activation node.
segment.target: In the left-side pane, click the Active Directory-Based Activation node.

segment.source: In the right-side Actions pane, click Online activate forest to open the Install Product Key dialog box.
segment.target: In the right-side Actions pane, click Online activate forest to open the Install Product Key dialog box.

segment.source: In the Install Product Key dialog box, select the KMS Host key (CSVLK) that you want to apply to the AD forest.
segment.target: In the Install Product Key dialog box, select the KMS Host key (CSVLK) that you want to apply to the AD forest.

segment.source: If required, enter a new Active Directory-Based Activation Object name
segment.target: If required, enter a new Active Directory-Based Activation Object name

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: If you want to rename the ADBA object, you must do it now.
segment.target: If you want to rename the ADBA object, you must do it now.

segment.source: After you click Install Key, the name cannot be changed.
segment.target: After you click Install Key, the name cannot be changed.

segment.source: Click Install Key.
segment.target: Click Install Key.

segment.source: VAMT displays the Activating Active Directory dialog box until it completes the requested action.
segment.target: VAMT displays the Activating Active Directory dialog box until it completes the requested action.

segment.source: The activated object and the date that is was created appear in the Active Directory-Based Activation node in the center pane.
segment.target: The activated object and the date that is was created appear in the Active Directory-Based Activation node in the center pane.

segment.target: Related topics

segment.target: Scenario 1: Online Activation
